name: Needy Nebula
description:
*AVCon version is the latest version*

NEEDY NEBULA is an arcade planet building sim with space shooter bits and lots of alien collecting and resource management.

< FEATURES >

- Collect aliens and build a homeworld for them

- Shoot hearts at enemies to calm them!

- Side missions and secret things

- A variety of playable characters!

- PS4 Controller Support! (AVCon Version Requires PS4 Controller)

Please Support ♡ if you like.

Developed by invalidsalad, Additional Music By LifeOnDelay (Nick Casey)

Follow game at: https://twitter.com/invalidsalad_

Indie DB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/kzgame-space
